::Four Nightmares::

    The went flying back from the rocket blast. BA's s=
hots missed them beacuse of this, and before the hit the ground and broke t=
heir heads they converted to beast mode, and a nightmare always lands on it=
's feet.
    They hid for a little while to reload and get ready for anothe=
r attack. None were seriously damaged, just a little dented.
  ----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
  From: JP3884@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent:=
 Saturday, December 16, 2000 10:27 AM
  Subject: Re: Cross Fire


       Th=
e snow bank turned into a miniture snow storm with the discharge of 
  the =
Nightmares weapons. Taking this into account, Hell Beast ducked as the 
  s=
hots whizzed past his head. Poking up, he shot an optic blast at one of his=
 
  opponants, while sneding a spitfire of plasma at the other. 

        G=
remlin fell back, hit in the shoulder. His armor dented, he got back 
  ont=
o his knees, aimed his cannon at the two Nightmares, and sent a large 
  di=
scharge at them, hoping to send them, and the ground they were standing on,=
 
  blowing away.
